name: Napa County Mental Health Crisis Line
description: Napa County's 24-hour mental health crisis hotline provides immediate support for adults and youth experiencing mental health emergencies.
fullDescription: Napa County's 24-hour mental health crisis hotline provides immediate support for adults and youth experiencing mental health emergencies.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 adult crisis support
- Youth crisis line (1-800-843-5200)
- Mental health crisis intervention
- Referrals to county services
- Mobile crisis response
howToGetIt: Adults call 707-253-4711. Youth call 1-800-843-5200. Both lines available 24/7.
